title: Waste Classification and Characteristics
content:
Waste Classification and Characteristics

State Regulations
§ 382.80 - Classification of waste for disposal in land disposal facilities
§ 382.81 - Waste characteristics
§ 382.82 - Labeling requirements
§ 382.83 - Alternative requirements for waste classification and characteristics

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
